MajorClaims.MC1: communicating by e-mails or voice mails is better
MajorClaims.MC2: I would prefer to answer it by means of internet or voice mail

Claims.C2: you can write an e-mail at any time of the day
Claims.C3: when you write an e-mail you have enough time to think carefully about what you are writing and how it would be better to express yourself
Claims.C4: there is no chance to disturb people by sending them an e-mail

Premises.P1: In this case it is not so difficult to write an e-mail or to leave a voice mail
Premises.P2: even shy people feel themselves more confident
Premises.P3: Many people have problems with calling a person that they are not acquainted with
Premises.P4: I might not have time to call a person or to meet with him or her in an appropriate time
Premises.P5: for me it is better to leave a voice mail
Premises.P6: I get home at about midnight and I still need to answer some questions and to solve some routine problems
Premises.P7: I work and study at the university and I don't have spare time during the day
Premises.P8: you can change the word order or you can choose more appropriate style to sound more polite
Premises.P9: When you speak face-to-face you are not as able to control every word as you are when you write an e-mail
Premises.P10: You should not worry about interrupting an important conversation or some other business
